Post-Match Reflections: Erik Spoelstra benched Jimmy Butler in the fourth quarter of the Heat's 119-108 win over the Pelicans, citing Butler's 13-day absence and the group's performance on the floor
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jimmy Butler played just under 25 minutes in the win over the Pelicans
The Heat's win improved their record to 17-14, sixth in the Eastern Conference standings
Others: Jimmy Butler has been involved in NBA trade rumors
The Pelicans lost their 11th-straight game, falling to 5-29 on the season
